patthana23.23:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.23:2.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.23:3.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
